documents.document: @TaliaShadwell Yup & it means less experienced people are making these assessments b/c turnover is so high - it's the main reason I left.

An earthquake in the middle of my relaxation recording - needed to do it again twice.
@JohnMetta Finger representation (what he was doing) has been shown to have strong r'ship to good maths later on. True story.
@CarrieHKelly I totally understand. Online seems to trigger people to communicate in a way they never would face-to-face.

@CarrieHKelly Twitter u/stands diff between free speech & online abuse. Alt right don't.

I hereby rename 'aftershocks', GODDAM EARTHQUAKES! #eqnz

Dear aftershocks, you can stop now, I've had enough. Thank you. #eqnz #earthquake
@dragontam73 We're all ok. Got some sleep after about 3am - very tired but no school or work today, all cancelled.
The ground may have stopped shaking, but I haven't. #eqnz #earthquake.
@guardianscience 1 example isn't evidence, and source pls?? An ethics committee allowed unnecessary anaesthetic and knee incisions, REALLY??
@jamiesont First laugh I've had in days.

@trophimself I started to laugh... but then I couldn't.

Ok President Trump, so when should we expect ISIS gone then?
